timeline.bodyText:
What do you think about naming the package org.cloudfoundry.multiapps.controller.process.dynatrace?
My point is that all the classes are related to the dynatrace configuration. Event sounds more like something that is part of the flowable.
timeline.author: radoslav-d
radoslav-d

timeline.bodyText: I think it will be more structured if you move this code at the bottom of the file.

timeline.bodyText: I suggest that you either refactor the message or remove the log at all.
